name: Touch Type Tale - Strategic Typing
description:
Touch Type Tale is a real-time strategy typing game featuring competitive online play and a story rich campaign. By breaking genre conventions and with streamlined unit designs it offers a fresh experience for RTS-veterans and newcomers alike.

Key Features
  • Real-time strategy game controlled by typing words
  • Competitive online play including a ranking system and replays
  • Story rich campaign with mission-specific scenarios and rules
  • Streamlined design: No micromanagement, bloated tech trees or excessive amount of unit stats

Wishlist Touch Type Tale now to be notified when it is released!StoryA boy is wanted for his nimble fingers and has to find his place in a kingdom thrown into turmoil. The king is dead and four dukes and duchesses are trying everything they can to claim the throne. Meanwhile, the barbarian queen and her army are raiding settlements across the kingdom.
